infoDescription.message: Protects you from tracing and malicious domain names, filters banner ads, pop-up ads and video ads, all in real-time.

ominiboxTips.message: Enter your phone number or URL for quick authentication security

updateTips2.message: , the update history can be viewed on the official blog.

adblockInitTips.message: The malicious ad blocking engine is initializing. It only takes a few minutes. Do not close the browser during the initialization process.

optionTipsInputUrlisNull.message: The domain name you entered is empty, please check and enter

optionTipsInputUrlisError.message: The domain name you entered is incorrect, please check and enter

bankSafeTips.message: Detected that you are visiting a bank website, Cloudopt will escort you!

gameSafeTips.message: Detected that you are visiting the game website, Cloudopt will escort you!

shopSafeTips.message: Detected that you are visiting a shopping site and Cloudopt will escort you!

hospitalSafeTips.message: Detected that you are visiting the hospital website, Cloudopt will escort you!

guideStep1Content.message: Cloudopt AdBlocker can protect your security in real time, prevent tracking, malicious domain names, filter banner ads, pop-up ads and video ads. We will guide you through the initial setup.

guideSafeCloudSwitchContent.message: Block dangerous websites in real time and protect you from phishing and malicious URLs.

guideStep3Title.message: Block malicious ads and annoying popups

guideAdblockActivateSwitchContent.message: Speed ​​up page loading, save bandwidth, block malicious ads and pop-ups.

guideStep4Title.message: Protect your privacy from prying eyes

guideSafePrivacySwitchContent.message: Prevent websites, advertising companies, etc. from tracking your browsing behavior and protect your privacy.

guideDataCollectionSwitchContent.message: In order to better serve you, it will allow Cloudopt to provide some technical information and interactive data. Privacy Statement

guideStep6Content.message: You have completed the basic settings, and you can always find us to modify the settings in the upper right corner of your browser. You can also log in to your Cloudopt account or close this page directly.

optionAboutDescriptionDetail.message: You can get in touch with us via online chat, email, Twitter, etc. You can also join our user base to get updated information the first time, and there are many benefits waiting for you. © 2015-2019 Cloudopt<sup>®</sup>. All rights reserved.

optionAboutAdBlockCount.message: Total number of malicious ads and mining script blocks

optionAboutSiteBlockCount.message: Total malicious ads and tracker blocks

optionFiltersLastUpdatedAt.message: Ad blocking rule base updated on

filterNotUpdated.message: Ad blocking rule base not updated

optionAdblockActivatingContent.message: Intelligently block advertisements and malicious pop-ups on web pages based on your actual situation.

optionAdblockDisplayContent.message: Shows the number of blocked ads on the browser extension icon.

optionAdblockDescriptionDetail.message: Cloudopt<sup>®</sup> AdBlocker Can prevent pop-up ads and load web pages faster. We will automatically subscribe to the appropriate rules based on your country. You can also subscribe to your favorite list of ad blocking rules (automatic deduplication) or manually block on the webpage.

ruleListUpdateSuccess.message: The ad blocking rule base was updated successfully! Click to update again.

ruleListUpdateFail.message: The ad blocking rule base update failed. Please check the network connection and click to try to update again.

optionBookmarkSearchContent.message: Automatically helps you retrieve bookmarks and embed them in search results when searching on a search engine.

optionRightClickSearchContent.message: 您在浏览网页鼠标右键可进行快速搜索。

optionDataCollectionContent.message: In order to better serve you, it will allow Cloudopt to provide some technical information and interactive data. Privacy Statement

optionMiscDescriptionDetail.message: Cloudopt<sup>®</sup> AdBlocker will also provide you with some powerful and useful accessibility features to enhance your user experience when browsing the web. If you have the features you want, you can send an email to support@cloudopt.net.

optionDNSSpeedContent.message: Perform DNS resolution on websites that may be visited in advance to speed up the speed of connecting websites.

optionWebPrereadingContent.message: Loads pages that may be visited in advance to increase page opening speed.

optionMemoryOptimizeContent.message: When the memory usage is higher than 80%, memory optimization is automatically performed for tab pages that have not been accessed for a long time.

optionOptimizationContent.message: Speed ​​up your webpage visits and improve user experience

optionOptimizationDetail.message: Cloudopt<sup>®</sup> Speed ​​technology can take advantage of some browser features to help you load web pages faster and increase your web page access speed. It can also help you reduce your browser ’s resource footprint.

optionSafeCloudContent.message: Block dangerous websites in real time to protect you from phishing and malicious URLs.

optionSafeDownloadContent.message: Automatically blocks downloads from dangerous websites and prevents malicious websites from downloading automatically.

optionSafePrivacyContent.message: Effectively prevents analytics sites from tracking or recording your web activity.

optionSafePotentialContent.message: When opened, it will also block unwanted websites and websites with low reputation.

optionSafeCoinContent.message: Helps prevent your computer from being used for mining (Bitcoin) by malicious websites.

optionSafeTipsContent.message: Pop-up security tips when visiting websites that are easily impersonated, such as banks and e-commerce.

optionSafeContent.message: A secure network for users worldwide

optionSafeDetail.message: Cloudopt<sup>®</sup> Cloud Security Network is a threat analysis system based on the reputation assessment mechanism. It connects users around the world and protects your web pages in real time. Cloudopt<sup>®</sup> AI analyzes network threats in real-time, 7x24.

optionSafeOfficalLink.message: For more information, please visit the official website.

optionsSafeConnectionFail.message: Unable to connect to the Cloud Security Center, please check your network and try again.

optionLoggedInTips.message: Protecting your privacy in real time

optionLoginRefreshTips.message: Please refresh the page after successful login

popupNoNeedGrade.message: This page does not require ratings

popupNotValid.message: Cannot take effect on this page

popupSystemPage.message: This page may be the browser's own page, we are still protecting you in real time.

popupEvaluateTipsSubtitle.message: Your feedback will help more people fight off dangerous, phishing sites.

popupGradeSubtitle.message: Click to view website reputation report

popupManualTitle.message: Manually block ads for this site

popupNoNeedManual.message: No ads to be blocked in this page

popupMoreSubtitle.message: Click to go to detailed settings

memoryOptimizedSub.message: Cloudopt Adblocker intelligently optimizes tabs that have not been accessed for a long time and releases memory
